thread.title: BRIEF-Akoustis Announces Pricing Of $15 Million Offering Of Convertible Senior Secured Notes

title: BRIEF-Akoustis Announces Pricing Of $15 Million Offering Of Convertible Senior Secured Notes
text:
May 10, 2018 / 12:18 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Akoustis Announces Pricing Of $15 Million Offering Of Convertible Senior Secured Notes Reuters Staff
May 10 (Reuters) - Akoustis Technologies Inc:
* AKOUSTIS ANNOUNCES PRICING OF $15 MILLION OFFERING OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR SECURED NOTES
* AKOUSTIS TECHNOLOGIES INC - PRICING OF PRIVATE OFFERING OF $15 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 6.5% CONVERTIBLE SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2023 Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
